name: keepit
description: A simple web app to create, edit and structure notes.

scripts.start:app: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "node server.js"
scripts.install:dep: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm run start"
